preparations.step: Bring the coconut milk and water to boil
Add oil to the boiling mixture
When boiling, pour in the rice and slow cook till ready
Heat water over medium heat in a deep pan. Make sure the pan has a handle.
Sprinkle about 1 tbsp of maize meal while the water comes to a boil.
Add the maize meal and keep stirring with a strong wooden spoon.
Keep stirring and keep pressing the mixture against the sides of the pan to break up the lumps.
Allow it to cook for 3-4 minutes. At this point transfer it to a platter from the pan and pat it down into a shape.
Prepare your grill and have it hot. Toss the meat with the oil, then thread it on skewers.
Grill the skewered meat, basting it occassionally with the salt water, until it is cooked to your desired doneness.
Remove the meat from the skewers and serve with kachumbari salad and ugali.
